title: Latest upgrades in Sonam Kapoor Ahuja's ethnic wardrobe
text:
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Sonam K Ahuja (@sonamkapoor) on Oct 3, 2019 at 2:01am PDT

View this post on Instagram A post shared by Sonam K Ahuja (@sonamkapoor) on Oct 3, 2019 at 1:57am PDT

Sonam Kapoor Ahuja is known for her sartorial excellence. B-town’s most loved fashionista, Sonam is popular for acing all styles, from western to Indian and everything in between. With festivities on our mind, here’s cataloguing the latest trends that the actor is donning this season. If there’s one fad that’s topping the list, it has to be the grand comeback of full-sleeves. Read on to know more.-Bell sleevesWide square necklineOxidized silver jewelleryDramatic winged eyeliner
description: Sonam Kapoor Ahuja shares ethnic trends likeBell sleeves, Wide square neckline, Silver and gold jewellery, Winged eyeliner, Collared kurtas, Full sleeves, Match
